sentences.en: James Heckman, the Nobel Prize-winning economist, has examined how the returns on education break down for individuals with different backgrounds and levels of ability.
sentences.cn: 诺贝尔经济学奖得主詹姆斯·赫克曼（James Heckman）研究了不同背景和能力水平的个人是如何获得不同的教育回报的。

sentences.en: Now Germany's Nobel Prize-winning author Gunter Grass has revived the memory of the 9,000 dead, including more than 4,000 children—with his latest novel Crab Walk, published last month.
sentences.cn: 如今，德国诺贝尔文学奖得主格汀特·格拉斯通过上个月出版的最新小说《蟹行》，重新唤起了人们对这9000名死者的记忆，其中包括4000多名儿童。

sentences.en: Will Prize-Winning Novels Shift Attitudes on Global Warming?
sentences.cn: 获奖小说会转变对全球变暖的态度吗？
